books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: Lieutenant Eve Dallas must find a killer inspired by police thrillers before another victim is murdered.
books.name: DARK IN DEATH

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: Louisa Clark moves to New York and is torn between high society and the life she enjoys at a vintage clothing store.
books.name: STILL ME

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: The story of a love triangle is told from several points of view.
books.name: THE WIFE BETWEEN US

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A widow left out of her huband's will tries to make a new life as a fashion designer.
books.name: FALL FROM GRACE

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth has grown increasingly grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Kat Martin
books.description: The second book in the Texas Trilogy series.
books.name: BEYOND DANGER

books.author: by Alan Bradley
books.description: Flavia de Luce, a young British sleuth, gets involved in solving a murder after experiencing a family tragedy.
books.name: THE GRAVE'S A FINE AND PRIVATE PLACE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: In San Francisco, Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club face their toughest case yet.
books.name: 16TH SEDUCTION

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: A killer must choose between his motorcycle club and a woman who works in a nearby bar.
books.name: JUDGMENT ROAD

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY
